Articles.Content:
T-cell samples are in friendly cruiser's labs

- - - Updated - - -

\*Finally locate xannari\* XANNARI!
[The T-Cell extralinks the physiology of both Krynn and original user. You take out one, you take out both]

[Okay, here's the plan: All forces fire missiles at one point in the shield, while the shield disrupt or activates. Sampa and I fly through the temporary hole in the shield in a shuttle, and dock to the ship. We then find Xannari, and cure her. Then we exit in the shuttle, as a second wave of missiles busts a second hole in the shield.]

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> [The T-Cell extralinks the physiology of both Krynn and original user. You take out one, you take out both]

.....
I made a,promise to save you...it's time i made good on that promise.

The Venusian Empire deploys its KODs and sheild disruptors on a large military system of the Krynn, obliterating it totally and preventing any future Krynn development on it. They are no longer capable of waging large-scale war!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T19:20:49Z" title="07/15/2015 07:20  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Souper**

I modified my device to destroy the Krynn cells alone.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> The Venusian empire locates Xannari, who is drifting in intergalactic space in the Sloan Great Wall. They send a stealth evac ship to collect her and bring her to Tylo.

She's hiding on the Krynn mothership.
Laythe, one problem, i'm already ON the enemy ship.

And it would be foolish to approach her, as who knows what she can do now......

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Laythe, one problem, i'm already ON the enemy ship.

I'll rendezvous with you at the main docking station. Don't let Xannari near you.
\*Charges krynn xannari\*

Everyone, prepare for first wave of missiles!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Don't let Xannari near you.

> 
> \*Charges krynn xannari\*

Ahem...

> 
> The Venusian Empire deploys its KODs and sheild disruptors on a large military system of the Krynn, obliterating it totally and preventing any future Krynn development on it. They are no longer capable of waging large-scale war!

Just reminding you all.

(Missiles fire)

I'm through the shield! Sampa, give me your position!
Sending...

> 
> Just reminding you all.

They are all on the mothership. There are no home systems or colonies.

> 
> I made a,promise to save you...it's time i made good on that promise.

[Formatting!!!]

[i don't think it's gonna let me send both messages in the same sentence correctly]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T19:26:19Z" title="07/15/2015 07:26  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**
Are you guys armed with KODs? Please god tell me you have them!

(Docks to nearest airlock)

Sampa, behind you!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> *Touching words.* *Nua**I**x**'**m i**s* *one* *s**of* *o**us* *r**no**r**w.**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹* *y*

I'm sorry? What?
I am now in total control over the SGW! Yes! Development on the technology we need to obliterate them is now underway!
Turns in time. To fire side arm into enemy's leg
And who is Nuax?

> 
> And who is Nuax?

Xannari's krynn name
Isn't it obvious? Sampa, you have to kiss her. It always works in fairy tales, right?

[i'll just say them separately]

*Touching words. Nuax is one of us now, as you will be!*

I'm sorry...
Xannari, i will not fight you, this thing has taken control of your mind. This isn't the real you, you can still fight this.
Sampa, take my advice....
